desc: The official website for the essential kayak accessory; The Kayak Leash. The Kayak Leash is a one of a kind accessory. Tired of back pain from bending over dragging your kayak? Tired of your kayak drifting away on the river or springs? Ache no more! The Kayak Leash is the smart way to pull and anchor your yak.

layout.text: ~ The smart way to pull and anchor your yak or stand up board
